venue.address_2: cross street is Washington Street in Dudley Station
venue.name: Haley House Cafe

item.description:
The Color of Film Collaborative in partnership with the Haley House periodically present documentaries and narrative films via Dinner and a Movie. The next offering is scheduled for Wednesday April 10, 2013. This is another great time to get together to enjoy each others company a meal and food for thought.

The film is the First Grader a sweet, inspirational and true story. You may find out more details as well as purchase tickets at the following link, http://www.brownpapertickets.com/event/335469

Run time is 105 minutes

This is sure to sell out so don't get left at the door, buy your ticket TODAY!

The menu will be announced soon and I'm sure it will be delicious.

Beer, wine and non-alcoholic beverages will be available for purchase.

Onyxbird Meetup members will be joining us.

Public Transit:

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit.
Orange Line subway to Ruggles Station then any bus to Dudley Station

Driving Directions:

Check out Google to arrange your driving directions

Parking:

Parking lot on Dade Street as well as along Washington Street.

 

 

Would also like you to know the Roxbury International Film Festival (RIFF) showcases and honors the work of emerging and established filmmakers of color as well as films important to our community. It has become the largest festival in New England dedicated to celebrating this genre. This is always a great time with fascinating people.

Run time for the 15th annual RIFF in 2013 is Thursday June 27th through Sunday June 30th.
item.how_to_find_us: If you want to sit with the group, you must prepurchase your ticket then email or call/text (617) 445-7549 with message to save you a seat.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner and A Movie at Haley House on Wednesday April 10th
